title: This bibliography is divided into sections as a convenience to the reader. Because the study is a mix of both historical and legal methodology, some of the sources follow more closely the legal citation style preference but they have been modified to fit with the nonlegal works (i.e. the names of law journals are spelled out and not abbreviated and the volume is placed before the title instead of after as in the nonlegal journals). The works listed are those referenced in this study. They are by no means the only works or sources consulted
